statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_disputes;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_amount, dispute_reason FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE merchant_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT dispute_id, customer_id, merchant_id FROM credit_card_disputes ORDER BY dispute_amount DESC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_status FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE dispute_amount > 100 ORDER BY dispute_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE dispute_id = 1000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as dispute_count FROM credit_card_disputes GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT merchant_id, AVG(dispute_amount) AS avg_dispute_amount FROM credit_card_disputes GROUP BY merchant_id;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_disputes ORDER BY dispute_amount DESC, dispute_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT dispute_reason FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE dispute_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE merchant_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, merchant_name FROM customers JOIN merchants ON customers.customer_id = merchants.merchant_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') ORDER BY customer_name ASC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, merchant_name FROM customers JOIN merchants ON customers.customer_id = merchants.merchant_id ORDER BY customer_name, merchant_name;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardDisputes;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_amount, dispute_reason FROM CreditCardDisputes WHERE dispute_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT name, category FROM Merchants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_reason FROM CreditCardDisputes WHERE dispute_amount > 500 ORDER BY dispute_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardDisputes WHERE dispute_amount > 1000;
SELECT dispute_id, dispute_reason FROM CreditCardDisputes WHERE merchant_id = 3 ORDER BY dispute_id DESC;

SELECT Customers.name, Merchants.name, CreditCardDisputes.dispute_amount FROM Customers JOIN CreditCardDisputes ON Customers.customer_id = CreditCardDisputes.customer_id JOIN Merchants ON CreditCardDisputes.merchant_id = Merchants.merchant_id;
SELECT AVG(dispute_amount) AS avg_dispute_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_disputes FROM CreditCardDisputes;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Merchants.name AS merchant_name, SUM(dispute_amount) AS total_disputes_amount FROM Customers JOIN CreditCardDisputes ON Customers.customer_id = CreditCardDisputes.customer_id JOIN Merchants ON CreditCardDisputes.merchant_id = Merchants.merchant_id GROUP BY Customers.name, Merchants.name ORDER BY total_disputes_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, card_number FROM customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT merchant_name, address FROM merchant WHERE merchant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dispute WHERE amount > 1000.00;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_date, resolution_status FROM dispute_resolution ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, card_number FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT merchant_name, address FROM merchant WHERE merchant_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, merchant_name, amount FROM customer c JOIN dispute d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN merchant m ON d.merchant_id = m.merchant_id WHERE c.customer_id = 3;
SELECT resolution_date, resolution_status FROM dispute_resolution WHERE resolution_id = 4;

SELECT c.customer_name, m.merchant_name, d.amount, dr.resolution_date, dr.resolution_status FROM customer c JOIN dispute d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN merchant m ON d.merchant_id = m.merchant_id JOIN dispute_resolution dr ON d.dispute_id = dr.dispute_id WHERE c.customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'f4c3dc83-1f0a-4f2b-91b4-62f7c16d005c';
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE merchant_id = 'd8a50248-4f17-45e0-a81f-0125d8f6ab22' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, merchant_name, transaction_amount FROM customers c JOIN merchants m ON c.customer_id = m.merchant_id JOIN credit_card_transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT resolution_date, resolution_description FROM resolution WHERE dispute_id = 'd5ca74b5-2c12-4282-b204-3e041b3f7e90' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT merchant_name, transaction_amount FROM merchants JOIN credit_card_transactions ON merchants.merchant_id = credit_card_transactions.merchant_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, merchant_name, resolution_date FROM customers JOIN disputes ON customers.customer_id = disputes.customer_id JOIN resolution ON disputes.dispute_id = resolution.dispute_id ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, merchant_name, dispute_reason FROM customers JOIN disputes ON customers.customer_id = disputes.customer_id WHERE dispute_reason IS NOT NULL;
